<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// è·å–åŒ…å«<li>å…ƒç´ çš„<div>å…ƒç´ 
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// å°†divsè½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ä»¥ä¾¿æ’åº
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// æŒ‰ç…§data-idå±æ€§å¯¹divArrayè¿›è¡Œæ’åº
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// éå†æ’åºåçš„divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // è·å–å½“å‰divä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰<li>å…ƒç´ 
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // ä½¿ç”¨data-idå±æ€§
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

searchUrl:
https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=
@js:
u="https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword=submit="
loc=java.get(u,{})
lo=String(loc.headers("location"||"Location")).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,"$1")
code=loc.statusCode()
if(code>=301){
uu=source.key+lo
java.log(uu)
re=java.ajax(uu)
java.log(uu)
na=re.match(/" name="(.*)" v/)[1]
va=re.match(/value="(.*)"\/\>/)[1]
no=re.match(/bute\("value","(.*)"\),d/)[1]
bd=`${na}=${va}&nonce=${no}`
java.log(bd)
url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=,"+JSON.stringify({
  "body": bd,
  "method": "POST",
    	})}else{url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit="}

<js>
    let customDelaySecondsStr = book.getVariable("custom");
    if (customDelaySecondsStr && customDelaySecondsStr.trim() !== "" && !isNaN(parseInt(customDelaySecondsStr))) {
        let bin = book.durChapterIndex;
        let cin = chapter.index;
        let inn = cin - bin;
        let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
        if (inn > 3 || inn < -3) {
            sleep(customDelaySecondsStr * 1000);
        }
    }
    result
</js>

    result = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
    let respone;
    let contentData = result.split("----");
    if (contentData[0] == "1") {
        //æ­£å¸¸é¡µé¢
        respone = java.get(book.bookUrl + contentData[1] + ".html", { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*" }).body();
    }
    else {

        respone = java.get(book.bookUrl + contentData[1] + ".html", { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*" }).body();
        let Jsoup = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
        let doc = Jsoup.parse(respone);
        let nextUrl = "{{source.getKey()}}/" + doc.selectFirst("#next_url").attr("href");
        respone = java.get(nextUrl, { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*" }).body();
    }
    result = respone

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
a = java.get("a");
var urlMatches = a.match(/"url":"(.*?)"/g);
var nameMatches = a.match(/"name":"(.*?)"/g);
var urls = [];
if (urlMatches) {
  for (var i = 0; i < urlMatches.length; i++) {
    var url = urlMatches[i].replace(/"url":"/g, "").replace(/"/g, "");
    urls.push(url);
  }
}
var names = [];
if (nameMatches) {
  for (var j = 0; j < nameMatches.length; j++) {
    var name = nameMatches[j].replace(/"name":"/g, "").replace(/"/g, "");
    names.push(name);
  }
}
var list = [];
var minCount = Math.min(urls.length, names.length);
for (var k = 0; k < minCount; k++) {
  list.push({
    surl: urls[k],
    sname: names[k]
  });
}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var $ = JSON.parse(result).result;
var i = 0, j = 0, pos = 0;
var k = $.chapter.length;
var l = $.page.length;
$.page = $.page.map(no=>Number(no));
while(i<k-1) {
  pos = Number($.chapter[i].pos);
  while(j>0 && $.page[j]>pos) {
    j--;
  }
  $.chapter[i].no = $.page[j]==0 ? "0" : "+"+$.page[j];
  $.chapter[i].page = "Page "+(j+1);
  $.chapter[i].next = [];
  j++;
  pos = Number($.chapter[i+1].pos);
  while($.page[j+1]<=pos) {
    $.chapter[i].next.push($.page[j]);
    j++;
  }
  i++;
}
$.chapter[i].no = "+"+$.page[j];
$.chapter[i].page = "Page "+(j+1);
$.chapter[i].next = [];
while(j<l) {
  $.chapter[i].next.push($.page[j]);
  j++;
}
var index = 0, list = [];
for (i=0; i<k; i++) {
  index = $.chapter.findIndex(it=>it.no==$.chapter[i].no);
  if (i==index) {
    list.push($.chapter[i]);
    j = list.length-1;
  } else {
    list[j].next = list[j].next.concat($.chapter[i].next);
  }
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>

textList : process(textList); } function getChapterContent(chapterNumber) { let chapterContent = []; let currentChapter = -1; let isFirstHeadlineFound = false; for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { let item = data[i]; if (item.type === 'headline') { currentChapter++; if (!isFirstHeadlineFound) { isFirstHeadlineFound = true; } if (currentChapter > chapterNumber) { break; } } if ((currentChapter === chapterNumber) || (chapterNumber === 0 && !isFirstHeadlineFound && item.type !== 'headline')) { if(item.type === "illus")chapterContent.push(`\n`); if(item.type !== 'headline')chapterContent.push(extractContent(item)); } } return chapterContent.length > 0 ? chapterContent.join('\n') : null; } result = ""; // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ç« èŠ‚é€»è¾‘ if (book.bookUrl.includes("ebook")) { let index = chapter.index; result = getChapterContent(index); } else { // éå†æ•°æ®ï¼Œæå–å¹¶æ‹¼æ¥ content data.forEach(item => { if(item.type === "illus")result += `\n` result += extractContent(item) + "\n"; // æ¯ä¸ªæ®µè½æ¢è¡Œ }); } }else{ bookName = java.getString("@class.article-title@text"); bookAuthor = java.getString("@class.author-item@text"); imgSrc = java.getString("@class.cover shadow-cover@img@src"); info = java.getString("@class.info@p@text"); result = `â—ï¸åˆ·æ–°æœ¬ç« è·³è½¬åŠ å…¥ä¹¦æ¶ç•Œé¢â—ï¸\nä¹¦åï¼š${bookName}\nä½œè€…ï¼š${bookAuthor}\n\nç®€ä»‹ï¼š\n${info}` if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl; script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8, ã€Š${bookName}ã€‹åŠ å…¥ä¹¦æ¶

`; java.startBrowser(script,"ã€Š"+bookName+"ã€‹") } } result

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var $ = JSON.parse(result).result;
var i = 0, j = 0, ch = {};
var k = $.chapter.length;
var l = $.page.length;
var b=$.page
$.c=java.log(JSON.stringify(b))
java.put("c",$.c)
while(j<l) {
  if (i<k) {
    ch = $.chapter[i];
    while(+ch.pos>$.page[j]) {
      ch.no = $.page[j];
      ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
      $.page[j] = ch;
      j++;
    }
    i++;
  } else {
    ch = $.chapter[k-1];
    ch.no = $.page[j];
    ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
    $.page[j] = ch;
    j++;
  }
}
JSON.stringify($.page);
</js>

for (var i = 0; i < lis.length; i++) {
     var href = lis[i].select('a').attr('href');

     if (href==0) {
        if ( i < lis.length - 1 ) {
            var url = "https://www.baidu.com/" + id + lis[i + 1].select('a').attr('href');         
        } else {
            var url = "https://cn.bing.com/" + id + lis[i - 1].select('a').attr('href');
        }
     } else { var url = base + href; }
     java.log(lis[i].text()+":"+url);
     list.push({"text": text, "href": url});
}

list
</js>
